entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
